**Description**

<!--
Briefly describe the problem you are having in a few paragraphs.
-->

If a `(content.ReaderAt).ReadAt` returns `io.EOF`, `content.ReadBlob` should ignore the error:
https://github.com/containerd/containerd/blob/1c5b384b3062bd8f05a73b10043eaca4cae4da75/content/helpers.go#L46-L60

```golang
// If the n = len(p) bytes returned by ReadAt are at the end of the
// input source, ReadAt may return either err == EOF or err == nil.
// ...
type ReaderAt interface {
	ReadAt(p []byte, off int64) (n int, err error)
}
```
title: content.ReadBlob should ignore io.EOF
